channel.title: CVE Feed for themehunk -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for themehunk -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-9707|2024-10-11T06:50:18.867Z -- themehunk -- hunk%20companion
item.description: The Hunk Companion plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized plugin installation/activation due to a missing capability check on the /wp-json/hc/v1/themehunk-import REST API endpoint in all versions up to, and including, 1.8.4. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to install and activate arbitrary plugins which can be leveraged to achieve remote code execution if another vulnerable plugin is installed and activated.

item.title: CVE-2024-8433|2024-10-08T09:33:14.205Z -- themehunk -- easy%20mega%20menu%20plugin%20for%20wordpress%20%E2%80%93%20themehunk
item.description: The Easy Mega Menu Plugin for WordPress – ThemeHunk plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘themehunk_megamenu_bg_image' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. Please note that this was partially fixed in 1.1.0 due to the missing authorization protection that was added.

item.title: CVE-2024-44049|2024-09-18T13:44:19.927Z -- themehunk -- gutenberg%20blocks%20%E2%80%93%20unlimited%20blocks%20for%20gutenberg
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ThemeHunk Gutenberg Blocks – Unlimited blocks For Gutenberg allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Gutenberg Blocks – Unlimited blocks For Gutenberg: from n/a through 1.2.7.

item.title: CVE-2022-40218|2024-08-03T12:14:39.960Z -- themehunk -- advance%20wordpress%20search%20plugin
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in ThemeHunk Advance WordPress Search Plugin.This issue affects Advance WordPress Search Plugin: from n/a through 1.1.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-1415|2024-08-01T18:40:21.120Z -- themehunk -- responsive%20contact%20form%20builder%20%26%20lead%20generation%20plugin
item.description: The Responsive Contact Form Builder & Lead Generation Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 1.8.9. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on several functions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to invoke those functions via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link. These actions may result in form deletion, and lead signup as well as file upload.

item.title: CVE-2024-1416|2024-08-01T18:40:21.037Z -- themehunk -- responsive%20contact%20form%20builder%20%26%20lead%20generation%20plugin
item.description: The Responsive Contact Form Builder & Lead Generation Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access to functionality due to a missing capability check on several functions in all versions up to, and including, 1.8.9. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to invoke those functions.

item.title: CVE-2024-1415|2024-06-04T18:00:51.583Z -- themehunk -- responsive%20contact%20form%20builder%20%26%20lead%20generation%20plugin
item.description: The Responsive Contact Form Builder & Lead Generation Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 1.8.9. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on several functions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to invoke those functions via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link. These actions may result in form deletion, and lead signup as well as file upload.

item.title: CVE-2024-1416|2024-06-04T18:00:03.450Z -- themehunk -- responsive%20contact%20form%20builder%20%26%20lead%20generation%20plugin
item.description: The Responsive Contact Form Builder & Lead Generation Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access to functionality due to a missing capability check on several functions in all versions up to, and including, 1.8.9. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to invoke those functions.

item.title: CVE-2024-4261|2024-06-04T17:56:22.649Z -- themehunk -- responsive%20contact%20form%20builder%20%26%20lead%20generation%20plugin
item.description: The Responsive Contact Form Builder & Lead Generation Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary shortcode execution in all versions up to, and including, 1.9.1. This is due to the software allowing users to execute an action that does not properly validate a value before running do_shortcode. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to execute arbitrary shortcodes.

item.title: CVE-2024-4261|2024-08-01T20:33:53.098Z -- themehunk -- responsive%20contact%20form%20builder%20%26%20lead%20generation%20plugin
item.description: The Responsive Contact Form Builder & Lead Generation Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary shortcode execution in all versions up to, and including, 1.9.1. This is due to the software allowing users to execute an action that does not properly validate a value before running do_shortcode. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to execute arbitrary shortcodes.

item.title: CVE-2024-8434|2024-09-25T13:30:29.959Z -- themehunk -- easy%20mega%20menu%20plugin%20for%20wordpress%20%E2%80%93%20themehunk
item.description: The Easy Mega Menu Plugin for WordPress – ThemeHunk plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access due to a missing capability check on several functions hooked via AJAX in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.9. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to perform actions like updating plugin settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-8433|2024-10-08T13:21:16.330Z -- themehunk -- easy%20mega%20menu%20plugin%20for%20wordpress%20%E2%80%93%20themehunk
item.description: The Easy Mega Menu Plugin for WordPress – ThemeHunk plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘themehunk_megamenu_bg_image' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. Please note that this was partially fixed in 1.1.0 due to the missing authorization protection that was added.
